car.title: Car Insurance
car.description: Comprehensive coverage for your vehicle, including liability and collision protection.

residency.title: Temporary Residency Insurance
residency.description: Specialized insurance for temporary residents, ensuring peace of mind during your stay.

life.title: Life Insurance
life.description: Secure your family's future with our flexible life insurance policies.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: PolSafe Insurance is a small, dedicated team of three insurance professionals based in Poland. With years of experience in the industry, we specialize in providing tailored insurance solutions to meet the unique needs of our clients.
about.description2: Our focus on car insurance, temporary residency coverage, and life insurance allows us to offer expert advice and personalized service. We pride ourselves on our commitment to our clients and our in-depth understanding of the Polish insurance market.

contact.title: Contact Us

footer.serving: Serving Poland with trusted insurance solutions.
